attributes.action: The Queen to desolve parlament and the people to elect a whole new government.
attributes.additional_details: The oposition state they want brexit but in reality the majority of them stand to loose financialy if we leave due to the removal of subsidies etc. they are in it for thier gains, Borris I feel is trying to do the right thing but is kack handed in implementing the desired outcomes. it is time for a complete change in polictics and replace all 600-700 MP's and the 100's of civil servants  who do nothing but cause  distruction. We have to date suvived two world wars and a banking fiasco which almost killed us all. but we brits are made of firmer stuff and we will survive a no deal and come out better at the other end
attributes.background: This Government and all other parties have shown total disregard for the referendum on brexit. the latest debarcle will now distroy our country and what integretity it once had.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
